transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Yeah, good morning sir. Main Akshita baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: Haan ji boliye mam.
Executive: Ji. Sir aapne actually mein Sunday call Saturday call kiya tha shayad Pandil ko, right? Ya customer care number pe something.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ji, toh main jaan sakti thi kya concern tha jiski vajah se aap reach kar rahe the?
Customer: Ah, main woh actually mein kya hai ki mera jo PC hai na update kara hai maine 11th liya hai window. Toh mera jo IndiaMART ka jo setup tha na woh active nahi ho raha.
Executive: Active nahi ho raha matlab kya usme login nahi ho pa raha hai?
Customer: Haan, login nahi ho pa raha hai.
Executive: Toh abhi tak nahi login hua ya main guide karu abhi?
Customer: Haan, abhi tak nahi hua toh maine aisa PC mein koi problem hoti nahi kyunki normal chrome ke upar chalta hai sir. Kyunki aap jo chala rahe hain na woh koi software matlab install karke nahi chalate ho IndiaMART. IndiaMART just ek link rehta hai jo already chrome ke andar chalta hai. Toh usme ya toh specific reason aa raha ho ki kis vajah se kuch aisa hota hai ki kuch authority aapko deni padti hai apne naye PC mein.
Customer: Achcha aisa hai kya?
Executive: Jaise security haan security purpose se aapka PC na locked rehta hai. Software naya PC na aapka?
Customer: Haan. Hello?
Executive: Naya hai na? Aur usme kya
Customer: Haan, aawaz aa rahi hai aapko meri? Isme ye maang rahe hain mere ko product detail maang rahe hain dobara.
Executive: Product detail ka toh koi logic hi nahi banta. Aapne kya link kya dali hai upar? Seller.indiamart.com dala hai?
Customer: Ah, haan maine ye dala hai.
Executive: Seller.indiamart.com, correct?
Customer: Haan. Register.
Executive: Haan, usme spelling mein aa raha hoga product name nahi aa raha hoga ek page aa raha hoga jispe do person dikh rahe honge aisa kuch page dikh raha hai upar jahan pe ek box mein number dalne ka pad raha hoga. Please register and sign.
Customer: Nahi, isme already jaise maine mera mobile number dala hai na toh open toh hoga ya nahi. Magar isme mere ko abhi yahi aa raha hai current account aa raha hai business detail aa raha hai.
Executive: Is number se aapne number kya login kiya aapne?
Customer: 756765228.
Executive: Nahi toh is number is number se nahi login hoga sir. Aapka jo primary number hai woh I think koi aur hai. Ek second dijiyega. Primary number aapka jo hai na woh 98 se start hota hai sir. Is number se login hoga aapka account.
Customer: Haan. Achcha woh 982451228.
Executive: Yes, yes. Is number se aapka account ye MA industry wale jo account hai is number se registered hai. Toh aapko ye wala number dalenge fir is number pe OTP aayega toh aap login kar payenge apna seller portal.
Customer: Achcha toh ye sign out kar du ya nahi ye wala 75 wala.
Executive: Sign out kariye. Sabse pehle sign out kariye.
Customer: Okay, ye maine sign out kar diya.
Executive: Theek hai done. Ab login karne ka aa raha hoga.
Customer: Haan. Number daliye apna.
Executive: Okay. 9 2 5 7
Customer: Okay, ye abhi aa raha hai mere paas OTP.
Executive: Daliye OTP.
Customer: Ye mere paas aa gaya OTP.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ah, ho gaya okay mam ho gaya. Thank you ho gaya woh.
Executive: Okay. Most welcome sir. Ek cheez aapko dikhega haan number kya main ye keh rahi hu ye number aap aware nahi the kya?
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Main ye keh rahi hu aware nahi the aap ki kis number se aapka account login hota hai aisa kuch?
Customer: Haan haan woh kya do number hai na mere. Toh woh iske karan main confuse ho raha tha ki kaun se number se maine kara hai ye.
Executive: Ah, koi baat nahi. Pata hai sir actually mein ye hai ki us number se na aapka login hoga toh woh koi free account login ho raha hoga. Theek hai? Aapka jo paid account jo bana hai woh is number se bana hai. Theek hai? Aur aapka shayad waha pe login ho gaya hoga aur aapki profile wagera dikh rahi hogi aapko properly.
Customer: Haan haan dikh rahi hai okay okay.
Executive: Haan isme ek cheez aur dekh lijiyega sir aapko na aapki rating and review aap thoda sa ek baar check out kar lijiyega apne side se kyunki hamari kabhi communication hui nahi hai. Ek baar apni rating wagera check kar lijiye kyunki I think August ke baad se hame koi rating wagera kuch mila nahi hai. Toh I don't know matlab kaisa abhi chal raha hai kaam ki kya cheeze hai kahin stuck ho rahe hain toh aap bataiye hum discuss kar paye. Right jisme guiding required hai toh hum guide kar paye.
Customer: Nahi abhi toh yani sahi chal raha hai jo jaisa tha waise hi chal raha hai koi jyada farak pada nahi abhi koi.
Executive: Hmm. Theek hai domestic mein bhi kaam karte hain kya apart from export aisa kuch bhi hai kya?
Customer: Haan dono hi hai mera export ka bhi hai aur domestic ka bhi hai dono chal raha hai.
Executive: Achcha toh domestic se conversion ratio matlab jyada interested matlab domestic mein rehti hai ya export mein rehte hain thoda?
Customer: Nahi jyadatar domestic mein hi abhi rehta hai.
Executive: Achcha okay okay okay koi baat nahi. Toh domestic mein aapko jo hai na 17 buyleads milte hain weekly. 17 credit points milte hain weekly. Toh try kariye jitna consume kar pae utna better hai. Aap thoda bahut use karna aur start kariye taki hum aapko guide kar pae agar aap domestic nahi kaam karte hain toh. Taki buyleads credit aap apne badhaye aur jyada buyer se connect kar pae.
Customer: Okay mam.
Executive: Theek hai? And one more thing sir aapke jo export service hai uska renewal pending hai sir. Toh usko ek baar dekh lijiyega.
Customer: Okay okay theek hai mam.
Executive: Kyunki isko immediate process karwana padega. I think aapke paas call bhi aayi hogi account team se jo aapke account manager wagera hain. Call bhi kar rahe honge renewal ke regarding.
Customer: Haan abhi 10 days pehle aaya tha yani Diwali se pehle.
Executive: Haan Diwali se pehle kyunki Diwali kyunki already aapka renewal pending hai I think so. Toh woh hamare paas generate bhi ho jata hai toh abhi kya uska plan kar rahe hain sir process karne ka?
Customer: Nahi abhi plan nahi hai mam koi kuch bhi hai is export ka kyunki saal bhar ho gaya abhi kuch yani kuch aisa hua nahi hai ki bhai jo maine paise lagaye abhi refund aaye mere.
Executive: Achcha okay okay okay. Toh isme toh sir ek baar aapko service ke regarding baat karni chahiye. Jab aap jaise account manager service ke regarding jab baat karte hain na toh aapko bahut sare woh pointers batate hain export mein kaise deal karna hai ya kahan par aap stuck ho rahe hain. Toh guidance kafi milti hai kyunki bahut sare account mein jo export service karte hain client right. Toh woh kahin na kahin thodi bahut cheeze hoti hain expertise hamari hoti hai toh hum guide kar pate hain sir export mein aise kaam karna hai aise follow up karna hai is client ko reach karna hai toh guidance milti hai sir.
Customer: Ya. Hmm. Aapki industry ki haan.
Executive: Bolie.
Customer: Haan nahi main woh jo manager hai woh kya naam hai unka? Unse baat kar haan unse baat kar leta hu main.
Executive: Haan unse baat kar lijiyega. I think woh aaj available nahi hai. Theek hai? Maybe kal available ho toh ek baar discuss kar lijiyega. Aur aapka iske alawa koi concern toh nahi hai sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi okay thank you ho gaya mam.
Executive: Theek hai mam okay most welcome. Theek hai main aapka feedback close kar de rahi hu apne side se. Theek hai? Okay thank you.
Customer: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to login to IndiaMART account.

- Customer unaware of primary registered number.

- Export service renewal is pending.

- No returns on export service investment.



Resolution:

- Executive identified the correct registered number.

- Executive guided the customer to login with correct number.

- Executive informed about pending export service renewal.

- Executive suggested to connect with account manager.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect with account manager.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- login, registered number, export service, refund, buyleads
